name: Ansuura John Bosco Aristotle Kanpogninge Homepage
body:
## Ansuura John Bosco Aristotle kanpogninge

* M.Eng, BSc. 
* PhD Candidate (Research Assistant)UESTC, China
* Associate system Analyst, [ICT Directorate](http://www.uds.edu.gh/staff/ict-directorate)
* University Development Students, Ghana
* School of Computer Science and Engineering
* University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
* University for Development Studies
* Email: jansuura@uds.edu.gh / jansuura@gmail.com
* Phone: (+86) 18 628333260 / (+233) 24 1727274
* Address: No.2006, Xiyuan Ave, West Hi-Tech Zone, Chengdu, Sichuan, P.R.China 
* Home Address: UDS, Box 1350, Tamale, Northern Region, Ghana
***

**PhD Supervisor** 
[Professor Zhang Xiaosong, UESTC, China](http://www.ccse.uestc.edu.cn:8080/teacherteam-english/teacher/view.html?id=80)
**PhD Advisor**
[Associate Professor Wang Xiaofen, UESTC, China](http://www.ccse.uestc.edu.cn:8080/teacherteam-english/teacher/view.html?id=178)
***

### About Me
***
I am an Assistant Systems Analyst and Head,ICT Directorate , Navrongo Campus, of the University for Development Studies (UDS), Ghana and have been with UDS since September 2009. I am currently a PhD Candidate (Research Assistant) in computer science and Technology from the School of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China . I received my Master Degree (2015), in Computer science and Technology from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China Chengdu, China under the supervision of Prof. Xia Qi and Bachelor Degree (2007) in computer science from Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, Kumasi, Ghana.

### Research Interest
Cryptography, Information Security, Network Security and Data Security
***

### Publications
***
### Book
1. John Bosco Aristotle Kanpogninge Ansuura, Xia Qi: Distributed Privacy preservation matchmaking Protocol for Mobile Social Networks. Edited by Xia Qi, 09/2015; LAP LAMBERT Academic Publishing GmbH and Co. KG., ISBN: 978-3-659-77866-7

### Journal Publication
***
1. John Bosco Aristotle Kanpogninge Ansuura and Ismail Rashid Fadulilahi: Optimising the New Chinese Remainder Theorem 1 for the Moduli Set. International Journal of Computer Applications 08/2016; 148(4): 1-7. DOI:10.5120/ijca2016906811
2. I. R. Fadulilahi, E. K. Bankas, J. B. A. K. Ansuura: Efficient Algorithm for RNS Implementation of RSA. International Journal of Computer Applications 11/2015; 127(5): 975-8887. DOI:10.5120/ijca2015906381
3. Benjamin Klugah-Brown, John Bosco Aristotle Kanpognige Ansuura, Xia Qi: A Signcryption Scheme from Certificateless to Identity-based Environment for WSNs into IoT. International Journal of Computer Applications 07/2015; 120(9): 16-23. DOI:10.5120/21255-4099
4. John Bosco Aristotle Kanpogninge Ansuura, Qi Xia, Benjamin Klugah-Brown: Distributed Privacy Preservation Matchmaking protocol in Mobile Social Networks. International Journal of Engineering and Science Invention 05/2015; 4(5): 07-17. ANED:26.6718/04507017
5. Qi Xia, Jianbing Ni, Ansuura John Bosco Aristotle Kanpogninge, James C. Gee: Searchable Public-Key Encryption with Data Sharing in Dynamic Groups for Mobile Cloud Storage. JOURNAL OF UNIVERSAL COMPUTER SCIENCE 01/2015; 21(3-3): 440-453.


### Conference Publications
***
1. John Bosco Aristotle Kanpogninge Ansuura, Xia Qi, Richmond Martei Tei-Ahontu, Benjamin Klugah-Brown: Secure and Privacy-Preserving Matchmaking protocol for Mobile Social Networks. International conference on Logistics Engineering, Management and Computer Science (LEMCS2015), Shenyang, China; 08/2015; pp144-149.DOI:10.2991/lemcs-15.2015.28.

### Support or Contact
